Package tud.iir.extraction

Class Summary
ConceptDateComparator Sort concepts by the date they were last searched.
ExtractionProcessManager The ExtractionProcessManager manages the entity and the fact extraction process.
ExtractionType In the ExtractionType class the different extraction types are defined.
Extractor  
Filter The Filter class specifies thresholds for entity and fact trusts.
PageAnalyzer The PageAnalyzer's responsibility is it to perform generic tasks on the DOM tree.
Query Abstract Query class for entity, fact and snippet queries that are sent to a search engine.
XPathSet A set of xPaths.
